messages.content: ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ is an unofficial quantized model of Flux1 for ComfyUI.
Which quantization tools are used for ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ?
The quantization tools used for ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ come from https://github.com/casper-hansen/AutoAWQ and https://github.com/IST-DASLab/marlin.
Which GPUs are compatible with ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ?
ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ is only suitable for GPUs above sm_80, which are 30 series and above.
What dependency needs to be installed before using ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ?
The marlin dependency needs to be installed before using ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ, which can be done using the command: pip install git+https://github.com/IST-DASLab/marlin.
Where can the ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ model be downloaded from?
The ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ model can be downloaded from https://huggingface.co/MinusZoneAI/flux1-quantize/resolve/main/flux1-dev-unet-marlin-int4.safetensors.
Where can a simple example of using ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ be found?
A simple example of using ComfyUI-Flux1Quantize-MZ can be found in the examples folder.
